problem.title: Moments of Inertial
problem.p: A uniform rod has mass m and length d. Point A is the midpoint of the rod; point B divides the rod in 2:1 ratio. A small block of mass 2m is attached to the left end of the rod. Three possible axes of rotation are marked on the diagram.
Part 1. Find the moment of inertia of the rod about axis 1.
Part 2. Find the moment of inertia of the rod about axis 2.
Part 3. Find the moment of inertia of the rod about axis 3.
